channel.title: Newtownards on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Newtownards on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff

item.title: Newtownards Part Three
item.description: Back to Victoria Crescent once again this time on my own. Flew into Cork and Karen collected me at the airport. Next day I collected a van and drove up Newtownards.
